record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--H.R. 976

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that on Wednesday, September 26, when cloture is filed on the motion to concur in the House amendments to the Senate amendments to H.R. 976, that it be considered to have been filed on Tuesday, and the mandatory quorum be waived, notwithstanding rule XXII.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
